effects: Increase ATK, DEF and HP by 30%
Increase resistance to all elements by 30%
name: Battle Cyborg
Battle Cyborg
戰鬥機器
전투 사이보그
Cyborg de combat
Kampf-Cyborg
Ciborg de combate
desc_short: Boost HP, ATK, DEF, fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance by 30%
提高30%HP、攻擊防禦、全屬性耐性的數值
HP, 공격력, 방어력, 불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력 30% 상승
Augmente les PV/ATT/DEF, et la rés. à feu/glace/foudre/eau/vent/terre/lumière/ténèbres de 30%
Erhöht LP, ANG und ABW, Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Erd, Licht und Dunkel um 30%.
Aumenta VIT, ATQ, DEF y res. al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad un 30%
desc_long: Boosts HP, ATK, DEF, fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance by 30%.
提高30%HP、攻擊防禦、全屬性耐性的數值。
HP, 공격력, 방어력, 불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력이 30% 상승합니다.
Augmente les PV, et la résistance au feu, à la glace, à la foudre, à l'eau, au vent, à la terre, à la lumière et aux ténèbres de 30%.
Erhöht LP, ANG und ABW, Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Licht und Dunkel um 30%.
Aumenta la VIT, el ATQ, la DEF y la resistencia al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra luz y oscuridad un 30%.
